story_24_52000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Bwahahaha! What a bunch of weaklings! I can see
why you called yourselves Team Break!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_0200_10: There you are, Lear. We’ve been looking for you.
story_24_52000/2401_1001_0300_10: Ugh. Still hovering around, are you?
story_24_52000/2401_1001_0400_10: Well, since you’re here, take a look at my work!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_0500_10:
See?! Look how many sync pairs I took down
all on my own!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_0600_10:
No sync moves, no outside help—just me and my
own power!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Has it finally sunk in that I’m fine without your
precious teamwork?
story_24_52000/2401_1001_0800_10:
In fact, I’m BETTER without it! Having others
around would just hold me back!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Now that you’re this strong, what kind of king do
you plan to be?
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1100_10:
What’s with you, changing the subject all of
a sudden?
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Well, I’m in a good mood, so I’ll deign to answer
your question!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1300_10:
What kind of king will I be? The strongest king
of all!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I’ll be so strong, I’ll put down all the little
upstarts like you!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1500_10: The strongest king of all? Hm.
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Just wait and see! Once I grow even more
powerful, there’ll be no one who can defeat me!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Not [Name:PlayerNickname ], and not that
twerp with the red hat! I’ll clean all their clocks
and become the Champion of Pasio!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Then I’ll claim my crown to go with my title as
the strongest Trainer around!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Rachel! Sawyer! Time to march! Hoopa wasn’t
here, so we’re off to the next hideout!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_2300_10: What, did I stutter? Get a move on!
story_24_52000/2401_1001_2400_10:
I’m afraid we’re done going along with
your plans.
story_24_52000/2401_1001_2600_10: Did HE stutter? We’re saying, like, so long.
story_24_52000/2401_1001_2800_10: Do you understand what you’re saying?
story_24_52000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Absolutely. We’re giving up on you. We’ve
had enough.
story_24_52000/2401_1001_3000_10:
I really hoped that if you got to know lots of other
sync pairs here, it’d bring back the good in you.
story_24_52000/2401_1001_3100_10:
But if your recent behavior is anything to go by,
it seems I set my hopes too high.
story_24_52000/2401_1001_3200_10: It’s such a shame. It really is.
story_24_52000/2401_1001_3800_10:
F-fine! Do as you like! I never needed you
two anyway!
